amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit funding of companies who function to demonetize domestic entities based on their lawful speech.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits funding of companies who function to demonetize domestic entities based on their lawful speech.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Williams (TX) amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 206 (Roll no. 270).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Williams (TX) amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 206 (Roll no. 270).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
